name: SpeedCube!
description:
This is currently a Speedrunning game, with the main gameplay aspect being blasting yourself around with gun recoil

Currently the game has:

5 Platformer Levels

1 Bonus Level

3 Weapons: Shotgun,  Sniper, and Pistol

The Beta has the same, but with 3 extra levels, and a new player death SFX

Each Weapon is Uniquely balanced with their own uses:

Shotgun - High Power, Low Controllability

Sniper - Medium Power, Medium Controllability

Full Auto (Coming soon) - Low Power, High Controllability

Pistol (Secondary Weapon to the shotgun and sniper) - Low Power, Medium Controllability

Much more planned to come:

Several different game modes other then Speedrunning, like some kind of Rogue-like mode with upgrades and such

More Weapons, Player and Gun Skins and more

Updates are gonna be Weekly/Biweekly, with 2 Updates a month at the very least, but likely to be more. Upon this initial release there will be more frequent little updates dropping every few days

Discord Server:

https://discord.gg/3fdUUHHApV

come here to ask any questions, give suggestions, submit Speedruns, Get your own Pixel art in the game,  or just chat!
